History and Applications¶

Contents¶

History¶

Work on aggregate started in 1997 at CNA Re in Matlab. [SCARE](http://www.mynl.com/wp/default.html) and [MALT](http://www.mynl.com/MALT/home.html) and SADCo in C++.

Insurance Pricing¶

Reinsurance Pricing¶

Capital Modeling¶

Capital Allocation and Pricing¶

aggregate

aggregate is a Python package providing fast, accurate, and expressive datastructures designed to make working with probability distributions easy and intuitive.
